    • Method Detail

      • findRelatedUniversities

        public java.util.ArrayList<University> findRelatedUniversities(University university,
                                                               int n)
        This method holds the algorithm for finding related universities to a given university
        Parameters:
        university - to be compared to
        (n) - number of recommended universities the user would like
        Returns:
        an array of size n holding the most closely related universities

      • getUniversity

        public University getUniversity(java.lang.String name)
        This method gets a university out of searchedUniversities
        Parameters:
        name - of the university to be gotten
        Returns:
        the university object in the list, will ben null if it doesn't not exist

      • search

        public boolean search(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String state,
                      java.lang.String location,
                      java.lang.String control,
                      int numberOfStudents,
                      int numberOfStudents2,
                      double percentFemale,
                      double percentFemale2,
                      double SATVerbal,
                      double SATVerbal2,
                      double SATMath,
                      double SATMath2,
                      double expense,
                      double expense2,
                      double percentFinancialAid,
                      double percentFinancialAid2,
                      int numberOfApplicants,
                      int numberOfApplicants2,
                      double percentAdmitted,
                      double percentAdmitted2,
                      double percentEnrolled,
                      double percentEnrolled2,
                      int academicScale,
                      int academicScale2,
                      int socialScale,
                      int socialScale2,
                      int qualityOfLifeScale,
                      int qualityOfLifeScale2,
                      java.lang.String emphasis)
        This method talks to the DBcontroller to search the database based on given conditions, it will put all searches in searchedUniversities
        Parameters:
        name - of university
        state - of university
        location - of university
        numberOfStudents - at the university
        percentFemale - students at the university
        SATVerbal - of the average student at the university
        SATMath - of the average student at the university
        expense - of the university
        percentFinancialAid - of the average student at the university
        numberOfApplicants - at the university
        percentAdmitted - at the university
        percentEnrolled - at the university
        academicScale - of the university
        socialScale - of the university
        emphasis - of the university
        Returns:
        the condition attached to whether or not any matches were found to the search
